name: Networking 101 - Gamified ChatGPT Course
description: Supercharge your networking skills and unlock a world of professional opportunities with our comprehensive Networking 101 course.Not another generic course or set of prompts.Discover the secrets to successful networking and establish a powerful professional network that propels your career forward. Our Networking 101 course is a step-by-step guide that equips you with the skills and insights to build authentic relationships, expand your influence, and open doors to new opportunities.Are you tire
features: Lesson 1: Introduction to Networking (70 prompts); Lesson 2: Building a Personal Brand (70 prompts); Lesson 3: Online Networking (70 prompts); Lesson 4: Face-to-Face Networking(70 prompts); Lesson 5: Building and Maintaining Connections(70 prompts); Lesson 6: Networking Project and Reflection (70 prompts); 50+ Networking Definitions; Networking Roadmap; 50+ Networking Tips; Notion AI features
